root.name: Donkey Kong: Barrel Blast
root.description: GameplayOriginally developed for the Gamecube for use with the DK Bongos peripheral, production was later moved to the Wii, where instead of the bongos, you use the Wii remote and Nunchuck. The Remote acts as the right drum pad and the nunchuck the left, shaking the remote makes Donkey Kong or one of his friends fly to the right, and the nunchuck makes him or her move to the left.Â The key to winning involves timing your boosts when strings of barrels are ahead. Blasting through a barrel lengthens the duration of the current boost, and if done efficiently, can provide a huge advantage.
